Welcome to the Menagerie...

Like many Commanders, I carved my own path to Beagle Point and exchanged time and distance for memories and milestones. It was during this transformative journey that I was reminded about how easy it is to take for granted the simple comforts of living. The sights were beautiful, but myself and the small crew that lived aboard The Chrome Whale would feel the absence of a well-equipped kitchen most keenly.

There were more than enough pre-packaged shelf-stable meals to keep us all going for the entire trip, and the microwave cooker in the Type-10's tiny kitchenette did a decent job at heating them. There was also a crate of food cartridges in case of emergencies. But a properly cooked and prepared meal was a rare thing indeed.

There are some fleet carriers out there with bars offering burgers and hot dogs alongside the usual drinks, and while that's a welcome discovery on longer journeys outside of civilised space, I felt that there was a gap in the market for a higher level of service, despite the operational and logistical challenges of operating a restaurant on a megaship-class vessel.

Food & Drink Menu

Discover our carefully curated selection of dishes and drinks - combining local ingredients with interstellar flair to bring you a dining experience like no other.

Events & Music

Join us for live performances, themed evenings, and cultural celebrations aboard the Menagerie - where music and atmosphere meet the stars.
